```{r Load Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

---

```{r Group By, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
msleep %>%  
  drop_na(sleep_rem, vore) %>%  
  group_by(vore) %>% 
  summarise(`Average Total Sleep` = round(mean(sleep_total),1),
            `Maximum REM Sleep` = max(sleep_rem)) %>%  
  arrange(desc(`Average Total Sleep`)) %>%  
  view
  
```
